Author: CVerification
Title: [ANN][ICO] CVerification - Blockchain-based Background Verification Platform
Body: [ANN][ICO] CVerification - Blockchain-based Background Verification Platform  CVerification is a blockchain-based recruitment and background verification platform.  https://i.imgur.com/1DMlrff.jpg    CVerification is a distributed and secure system on which every user can receive verified employment and educational references, store a verified testimony of his/her professional achievements and share it with all potential employers.  The Market: Currently there is no centralized or decentralized service offering comprehensive employment background screening which is simultaneously fast, fully automated and cheap. The existing solutions do not guarantee successful background screening that allows companies to hire with confidence. They also do not guarantee the security of sensitive data which applicants need.  Our Solution: CVerification is a decentralized blockchain-based background check services platform. The platform makes possible the exchange of employment references in a way which guarantees the genuineness of the documents. Both companies and applicants profit from the improced hiring process with CVerification.  The Opportunity: CVerification will disrupt the background check services industry which achieves combined annual revenues of $2bn. All early adopters can profit immensely from the success of CVerification.  Here is an overview of the relevant ICO information:  Pre-ICO Beginning End Duration Bonus June 17th, 2018 - July 1st, 2018 2 weeks 35% July 1st, 2018 - July 8th, 2018 1 week 30% July 8th, 2018 - July 15th, 2018 1 week 25%  Break July 15th, 2018 - July 29th, 2018 2 weeks  ICO July 29th 2018 - August 12th, 2018 2 weeks 20% August 12th, 2018 - August 19th, 2018 1 week 15% August 19th, 2018 - August 26th, 2018 1 week 10% August 26th, 2018 - September 2nd, 2018 1 week 5% September 2nd, 2018 - September 16th, 2018 2 weeks no bonus  1 ETH = 3,000 CVER tokens. The total amount of CVER tokens available for sale will be 186,000,000.  In the Pre-ICO and ICO the following cryptocurrencies will be accepted: Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC). The minimum investment is 0.10 ETH or the equivalent in BTC.   More information about CVerification is available in our whitepaper.    Subscribe to our newsletter on www.CVerification.com to keep up with the latest news about CVerification and to receive a notification when the token sale begins.  Follow us: Website Whitepaper LinkedIn Facebook YouTube Twitter Telegram
